message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I think you'll find it's a great investment. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1,100,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the opportunity, $1,100,000 is a bit out of my budget.  I'm willing to pay $850,000 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $850,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $950,000. This is the lowest I can go.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $950,000 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $900,000. This is my final offer.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you at $925,000. This is my final offer.
